channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Polis, 11–18 June 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• SMER–sociálna demokracia (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Sloboda a Solidarita (ECR): 1 seats
  • OBYČAJNÍ ĽUDIA a nezávislé osobnosti (ECR): 0–1 seats
  • Slovenská národná strana (ECR): 1 seats
  • Kotleba–Ľudová strana Naše Slovensko (NI): 1–2 seats
  • SME RODINA (EAPN): 0–1 seats
  • MOST–HÍD (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Kresťanskodemokratické hnutie (EPP): 1 seats
  • Progresívne Slovensko–SPOLU–Občianska Demokracia (ALDE): 2–3 seats
  • Za ľudí (*): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Polis, 11–18 June 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Polis, 11–18 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• SMER–sociálna demokracia (S&D): 16.2–20.6%
  • Sloboda a Solidarita (ECR): 7.0–10.2%
  • OBYČAJNÍ ĽUDIA a nezávislé osobnosti (ECR): 5.0–7.8%
  • Slovenská národná strana (ECR): 6.2–9.3%
  • Kotleba–Ľudová strana Naše Slovensko (NI): 9.7–13.4%
  • SME RODINA (EAPN): 3.9–6.4%
  • MOST–HÍD (EPP): 3.9–6.5%
  • Kresťanskodemokratické hnutie (EPP): 6.8–10.0%
  • Progresívne Slovensko–SPOLU–Občianska Demokracia (ALDE): 13.1–17.2%
  • Za ľudí (*): 4.1–6.7%
